C

calculateVelocity(int, int, int, int) - Method in class topdown.Bullet
Determines the velocity of the bullet depending on where it is shot from and towards what point.
checkForNewRound(int) - Method in class topdown.Game
Checks the entire list of objects to see if any enemies remain.
checkIfWon() - Method in class topdown.Game
Declares the player a winner if all of the enemy objects have been removed.
clearGame() - Method in class topdown.Game
Clears the game of all items in the handle list.
color - Variable in class topdown.Enemy
Holds the color of the enemy object.
color - Variable in class topdown.PlayerSupplies
Holds the color of the supply object.
controlMenu - Variable in class topdown.Game
Used for rendering the "controls" screen for the game.
controls - Variable in class topdown.OptionsMenu
String holds the controls text.
ControlsMenu - Class in topdown
Class used to display the controls menu.
ControlsMenu - topdown.State
The game is showing a menu state.
ControlsMenu(Game) - Constructor for class topdown.ControlsMenu
Constructor initializes strings to be used to display controls for the game.
createSupply(Type) - Method in class topdown.PlayerSupplies
Creates the player supply objects.
credits - Variable in class topdown.Game
Used for rendering the "credits" screen for the game.
credits - Variable in class topdown.OptionsMenu
String holds the credits text.
Credits - Class in topdown
Class used to display the Credits submenu.
Credits - topdown.State
The game is showing credits state.
Credits(Game) - Constructor for class topdown.Credits
Constructor initializes the Strings and sets the passed down instance of Game to this class's instance of Game.
